Title: Police bust multi-state vehicle theft syndicate linking Enugu, Abia, Lagos
Summary: Police in Enugu State recovered stolen heavy-duty trucks and a sports utility vehicle . They uncovered a vehicle theft network operating across Enugu, Abia and Lagos states . Police said the recoveries were made .

Title: Obi, Nwobodo, Nwodo, Egwu, others hold closed door meeting in Enugu
Summary: Peter Obi, the presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP) in the 2023 general elections, is currently in a closed door meeting with the former governor of Old Anambra State, Chief Jim Nwobodo . Obi, arrived at the Amechi, Nkanu West country home of the former Governor .

Title: How Haba Naija is helping Nigerian businesses gain visibility in a competitive digital economy
Summary: Nigeria’s business landscape has evolved rapidly over the past decade . From small, family-run enterprises to fast-growing startups, more businesses are competing for attention in an increasingly crowded digital space . While entrepreneurship continues to grow, visibility remains one of the most important issues .

Title: CSOs express worry over alleged breaches in Appropriation Acts, fiscal rascality
Summary: CSOs express worry over alleged breaches in Appropriation Acts, fiscal rascality . CSOs raise concerns over perceived constitutional breaches in the recent repeal and re-enactment of the 2024 and 2025 Appropriation Act .

Title: Police foil armed robbery attack, neutralise one suspect in Akwa Ibom
Summary: Police foil armed robbery attack, neutralise one suspect in Akwa Ibom . The Akwa ibom State Police Command reported that on January 2, 2026, its operatives stopped an armed robbery at a petrol station .

Title: Bandits abduct veteran photojournalist in Kaduna community, heighten residents’ fears
Summary: Suspected bandits have abducted a veteran photojournalist, Malam Umar Usman Iyale, in Danhonu II community, Chikun Local Government Area of Kaduna State, heightening fear and tension among residents .

Title: Mbappe ruled out of Spanish Super Cup due to injury
Summary: Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe ruled out of Spanish Super Cup due to injury . Atletico Madrid play Barcelona in the semifinals on Thursday . Barcelona take on Athletic Bilbao on Wednesday .

Title: Yusuf can defect with NNPP mandate like you did to PDP - Shekarau tells Kwankwaso
Summary: Shekarau faulted Kwankwaso’s recent remark that Governor Yusuf should relinquish his mandate before defecting, describing the position as inconsistent with past political actions .

Title: IGP orders deployment of DIG Gumel, 17 CPs to strategic departments, commands
Summary: IGP Olukayode Adeolu Egbetokun orders deployment of DIG Gumel, 17 CPs to strategic departments, commands and formations . The newly promoted Deputy Inspector-General of Police, DIG Mohammed Usaini Gumel .

Title: ‘Together always’, Lookman says as he shares new post with Osimhen
Summary: Ademola Lookman played down suggestions of a rift within the Super Eagles team . Ademol Lookman shared photos of himself with Victor Osimhen and Bruno Onyemaechi following Nigeria’s victory over Mozambique at the Afcon round of 16 .

Title: 2027: Diri, Bayelsa APC stakeholders endorse Tinubu
Summary: The Bayelsa APC members endorsed President Tinubu for re-election in 2027 . The meeting was convened by Governor Douye Diri on Tuesday at the Chief DSP Alamieyeseigha Banquet Hall in Yenagoa . Diri urged the members to play by the rules and engage in politics of consultation

Title: BREAKING: Turaki-led PDP NWC in closed-door meeting with Jonathan
Summary: The Tanimu Turaki (SAN)-led National Working Committee of the Peoples Democratic Party is holding a closed-door meeting with former President Goodluck Jonathan . Title: Police deploy experts to evacuate explosive in Niger
Summary: The Niger State Police command has deployed bomb experts to evacuate a bomb discovered by the roadside in the state . The state Commissioner of Police, Adamu Elleman, made this known on Tuesday when he confirmed the discovery of the bomb . He urged the people to go about their legitimate businesses without fear of intimidation, saying experts had been deployed

Title: Obi's defection from LP shows leadership failure — Ex-Delta gov aspirant
Summary: Former Delta State governorship aspirant slammed Peter Obi's defection from Labour Party to African Democratic Congress . Obire said Obi’s inability to maintain a functional party structure after the 2023 general elections prompted his defection to the ADC . He added that Obi not only inherited a weak structure but further dismantled it, leaving the party

Title: NANS shelves planned nationwide protest after meeting with FIRS, others
Summary: The National Association of Nigerian Students has called off its proposed nationwide protest over the new Tax Reform Act . The decision was contained in a communiqué issued at the end of the maiden Expanded National Executive Council meeting of the association .
